title: Bloomberg Markets: Brevan Howard's Hedge Fund Loses $1 Billion
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Brevan Howard's Hedge Fund Loses $1 Billion
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Nathaniel Baker Editor Bloomberg Hedge Funds Brief Discussing Brevan Howard Asset Management’s flagship hedge fund suffering about $1 billion in outflows in April as investors continued to pull money, according to a Bloomberg News calculation based on the fund’s letters to investors.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
